issue.title: [Rust] Make ArrayData --> GenericListArray fallable instead of `panic!`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11952](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11952). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. Background:
   Left over cleanups suggested by from @sunchao on  https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9425
   
   Broken out from https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9508
   
1. Rationale:
   
   Rationale: don't use panic! directly (though the caller of this function still calls `unwrap()` so I am not sure how much of an improvement this change really is. However it sets us up for a more `safe` future eventually

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11952?focusedCommentId=17301639) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9691
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9691>
